attributes.action: Set up an enquiry of  last 5 years' audited accounts of all British Banks with the view to uncovering any false accounting.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Accountancy firms have failed in their duty to provide a fair and true representation of company accounts, especially with respect to risk management and strength of balance sheets.
 
The Government should create an independent regulator for auditing with powers to impose unlimited fines on accountancy firms that collude with companies to misrepresent their accounts or are simply incompetent.

Persistent offenders should have their licence to practice revoked and their directors or Partners goaled.

A small number of global  accountancy and consulting firms audit the top 500 companies. These firms should be broken up to create more competition. 

No firm should be allowed to audit more than 10 percent of companies in any sector.

A new, more rigorous set of global accounting standards should be established and supervised by a super regulator.

The Government is requested to take a lead to establish the global regulator.

The global regulator should be given powers to close firms that break the new standards. It should be funded through a levy on companies and their auditors.
